about_the_game:
《Another World: Pirates And The Great Old Gods》

An exploration adventure game with chapter-style plots and Cthulhu elements.

This is the beginning of all adventures. You accidentally arrive in a different world and gain the ability to travel through different time and space...

You will try to explore the truth and find a way back to reality in the two scenes of the eternal pirate tavern and the temple of the old gods.

You are not alone. You will meet some friends or enemies in the eternal world. Completing their quests or defeating enemies can speed up your progress.

Be careful, many abnormal things will happen in this process. Always be careful of the power of the old gods and don't let them devour you...

Game Features:

An adventure game that combines role-playing, exploration, and puzzle solving.

You need to explore the scene, discover and collect hidden objects, solve puzzles, escape or defeat enemies, and after completing all this you will reach the end of the story.

Please pay attention to every detail in the scene, the truth of things is often hidden in inconspicuous corners.

Freely explorable scenes, rich interactive content, and multiple endings waiting for you to explore...

Note: Some content of this game is driven by sound effects, it is recommended to wear headphones for the best experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1060ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX2060

short_description: This is an adventure game with chapter-based plots and role-playing elements. You travel to the world of the old gods, trying to explore the truth and find a way back to reality...
